message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $15,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more to me.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer. I appreciate your response. I am still unable to meet at $13,000. Would you be open to discussing a price closer to my initial offer of $10,000?
